dcterms:creator: D. S. Marcus
A. F. Fotenos
J. G. Csernansky
J. C. Morris
R. L. Buckner
dcterms:description: The Multi-Atlas Labelling Challenge (MALC) dataset is used for segmenting MRI T1 brain scans into 27 cortical and sub-cortical structures, with manual segmentations provided by Neuromorphometrics, Inc.
dcterms:title: Multi-Atlas Labelling Challenge (MALC) dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Jimenez-del-Toro
et al.
dcterms:description: The Visceral dataset is used for segmenting 10 organs on whole-body contrast enhanced CT scans, with data from the silver corpus and manual annotations from the gold corpus.
dcterms:title: Visceral dataset
